pr_title: Store multiple game logs with time stamp

timeline.message: Store up to 10 game logs with time stamp

timeline.bodyText: How is that gonna look are there no seperation between Hours and minutes?
timeline.author: 1-alex98

replies.bodyText: Thought this was a standard time format but can be changed if you have one you like better that is file valid
replies.author: Sheikah45

replies.bodyText: idk I find it hard to read. Btw the old client used the game uuid as a name. Not sure of that would be an advantage. I think that was so you could match replay and game log.
replies.author: 1-alex98

replies.bodyText: That might be better I will just change to that if it works for you
replies.author: Sheikah45

replies.bodyText: Yeah sure. This is not what we gotta do, I also like the time. I am indecisive.
replies.author: 1-alex98

replies.bodyText: Yeah personally I think the time might be more intuitive for the user than game uid and I can add a dash separator for the time
replies.author: Sheikah45

timeline.message: Use game uid for naming log file
